function.name: pdf2ocr
function.description: Performs OCR on a PDF file to make it searchable. Optionally, save the OCR-processed PDF to a specified path.

input_file_path.description: The path to the input PDF file.

output_file_path.description: Optional path to save the OCR-processed PDF file. If not provided, the OCR text is returned.

language.description: The language to use for OCR. Defaults to 'eng' (English).
